name: killerspin
description:
Hands Down, The Best Ping Pong Game Ever!

Turn Your Phone into a Paddle and Play Ping Pong

Play Ping Pong like you have never played before, all new revolutionary controls make your phone into a virtual table tennis paddle and you are ready to smash the ball across the room!

Add killer spin and hit wicked cross shots just like life like play, and reach ping pong nirvana.

The most advanced AI opponents yet await you, think you can master table tennis and not beat these fools think again because the action never stops in killerspins most advanced ping pong game yet, the killerspin app. Are you ready to take your game to the next level? Upgrade to Pro Pack for $1.99 and play World Champions Biba Golic and Lupe! And only then can you too claim the title of a champion.
